tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (IN So) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ appears) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NP (JJ large) (NNS parts)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN flooring)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN bungalow)))))) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (ADJP (JJ rotten)) (CC and) (ADJP (RB very) (JJ wet))))))) (. !)))
